name: RiverSounds
0:
”Alexa open river sounds”
”Alexa ask river sounds to play for 8 hours”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: river sounds
des: Experience the soothing melodies of a gentle river's flow. Whether you're looking to enhance your focus, unwind after a long day, or simply find your inner peace, our meticulously captured river sounds will transport you to serene landscapes, helping you relax and rejuvenate wherever you are.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
